alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 1:54PM PST until December 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Oregon, Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington
